title: Day 0 Variables
message:
var myName <----declare
myName = 'alex'<----assign

is the same as 

var myName = 'alex' <----declare and assign

Declare = establish a variable 
Assign = give variable a value 

Data types: strings, numbers, boolean

var num1 = 1;
var num2 = 14;
var number = num1 + num2;
console.log(number); <---- will return 15

All variables must be declared or they will return a reference error. 

boolean = two things: true or false

var name = 'connor'

var bool = true;
var bool2 = false;

name = 'connor'
console.log(name === 'connor'); <---returns true
